description: Reports when a number of 5xxErrors is is high
prerequisite:
Make sure the MetricsConfiguration attribute is set with the Id for the bucket (see [docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-s3-bucket.html#cfn-s3-bucket-metricsconfigurations) )

Example : 
```
TargetS3Bucket:
    Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
    Properties:
        ...
        MetricsConfigurations:
            -
                Id: "${S3BucketName}-metrics"
``` 
where ${S3BucketName} is the value of the target bucket.
